member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.Diagrams.Extensions.ViewModels.LinkViewModelBase`1
member.summary: A generic base class for the link or connection in a diagram source.
member.example:
If you want to map the Content of the link to the Content of the connection you need to add a Style like so
<Style TargetType="telerik:RadDiagramConnection"> <Setter Property="ContentTemplate" > <Setter.Value> <DataTemplate> <TextBlock Text="{Binding Content}"/> </DataTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> .
